thread.title: Mahommed Naeem Mahomed
thread.title_full: AirportRentals.com reviewed by Mahommed Naeem Mahomed

author: Mahommed Naeem Mahomed
title: Mahommed Naeem Mahomed
text:
The car hire company Tempest gave me a nice little car which I was happy with.However when I booked immediately an amount of R 2000.00 was deducted from my credit card for full insurance that I did not approve.
Tempest holds a R 6000,00 deposit for almost 14 days which is ridiculous.
On returning the vehicle ,I filled fuel and returned the car with a full tank of fuel. The vehicle was checked and returned in perfect condition signed off.
Still waiting for my refund of R 6000.00 from Tempest Car Hire:(
